title: Update the Company Org Chart
description: Following a promotion, an HR admin needs to update the company's visual org chart.

tasks.description: Identify the employee whose reporting structure has changed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin identifies the employee and their new manager.

tasks.description: Ensure the reporting change has been made in the HRIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin confirms the 'reports to' field is correct in the HRIS.

tasks.description: Trigger a refresh of the org chart tool, which pulls data from the HRIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin initiates a data sync, and the visual org chart updates to reflect the new structure.
